item.title: Home Depot CFO says tariffs won't spur price increases
item.description: Home Depot said Tuesday it does not plan to raise prices because of President Trump's tariffs.

item.title: U.S. to pay out almost $5 million to family of Jan. 6 rioter Ashli Babbitt
item.description: The federal government is expected to pay out about $5 million to the family of Ashli Babbitt to settle a lawsuit brought by her estate.
